alert.note: Alert for Delaware (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 12:56PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Delaware County through 130 PM EDT... At 1256 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Downsville, or 11 miles south of Delhi, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Andes, Margaretville, Fleischmanns, Arkville, Dunraven, Big Pond Campsite, Russell Brook Campsite, Wolf Hollow, Halcottsville and Little Pond Campground. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Binghamton. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central New York.
